Type.BattleDialog: Alright~ This shouldn’t be a problem! Ready, everyone?
I’m a lot tougher than you expect. Think you can beat me?
None of my colleagues are reliable… Sigh… I only have myself to trust.
I won’t go easy on you just because you’re our guests. Please give me a good fight!
I have nothing to be afraid of! They’re humans just like us, anyway.
Think you can really dodge my attacks? Huhu…
Cheer up, everyone! We can do this. Oh, yes we can!
I bet you won’t stand a chance against me! Why don’t you come back when you get fit?
Wahaha! If anyone’s scared, just tell me. I’ll block all the attacks coming your way!
First, I swing like this… And the next was this, right? Alright, let’s do it the way I practiced!
Let’s not waste any more time and deal with this quickly.
I feel safe thanks to my friends fighting by my side.
Hey! Yeah, you there! I’m about to assault you, so I wanted to make sure you’re ready for it~
One, two… Three. I’m settled down now. I’m ready!
You just muttered about how weak we look, didn’t you?!
Stay still over there~ I’m on my way to give you a good smack!
Hold your position, everyone! If our formation is broken, we’re done for, got it?
I won’t let you through easily.
I hope I don’t have a tumble while running… Gotta start with the right foot first so I don’t fall, right…?
They don’t really look that threatening? Those guys seem pretty similar to me…
I’m so scared… I wanna hide behind a bookshelf or something.
If they get the impression that I’m a coward, I might be their first target…
Th-they…look awfully strong, c-can I really defeat them…?
Can’t make any mistakes. If I’m not careful, I might die here.
Let’s warm up~ Stretch my wrists~ And ankles too~ Till they’re relaxed!
…I’m gonna throw books at you if you scare me… So please don’t come at me…
You know this fight is not a joke, do you?
I’m pumped up! I feel like I could beat them all~
It’s gonna hurt if I hit you, y’know? It’ll definitely hurt. I’m saying, don’t come any closer!!!
Everyone is doing their best, so I’m sure we’ll win!
How’s this? Do I look cool when I pose like this?
How about a chant of support to pump ourselves up before we go in?
Everyone alright? If you have any trouble, don’t hesitate to tell us!
I won’t let any of you proceed further than this!
I’ll go Pshhhu, Puh-pow~ And boom! …On you, so have fun?
Whoever our foes may be, just leave ‘em to me! I’ll handle ‘em all.
I-it’s fine… We shouldn’t have any trouble dealing with those enemies…
An opponent with such stats… I believe we can defeat them fairly!
Alrighty~ Is it time to show off my skills?!
You got some nerve to pick a fight with me!
It’s not too late, I’ll give you one chance to beg for mercy and run away.
My heart is pumping like crazy, yet it doesn’t feel too bad.
Behold my utterly and completely flawless strategies!
Think we’ll just let you take the books here as you want?
C’mon, give me a bit more time to come up with a cool catchphrase~
I wanna wrap this up quickly and get some rest… So let’s get on with it.
Let’s sweep ‘em all in a big swipe, like swoosh~!
I suppose this battle is inevitable as per usual.
It’s gonna be real embarrassing to be taken down by the likes of them.
Let’s do this as we always have.
I hate annoyances, so let’s get this business done.
Don’t get ahead of yourselves. Careless actions will result in death.
Just be careful not to trip over your own feet.
Those guests can’t be any worse than the literal monsters we used to deal with, right?
My body doesn’t feel quite as strong as before… Not a fan of this.
This is the one kind of work we can handle in the most masterful way, yup.
I’m so upset. I would’ve swept them away like it was nothing back in the day… This is so frustrating~
It’ll take some time to get used to this.
Our equipment was nicer back then, to be fair. They were some ridiculous stuff…
I gotta be careful not to get cocky. I’m not as strong as I used to be.
This seems pretty doable, doesn’t it? At least we can keep eye contact with them without getting appalled.
I’m starting to feel tired… I’ve come too far without a break.
This atmosphere is pretty decent, isn’t it? There are no intimidating warning noises.
With the things I used to wield like they were part of my body being gone… I’m kinda stuck.
I’ve mastered the art of spotting a target’s weakness by now.
I thought I barely managed to survive, but I ended up in another crisis…
Maybe I’m too used to the equipment I wore in the past… My own body feels alien.
Huuu-cha! However the battle went… We won in the end.
Let’s retrieve the books and go back now! I wanna get done with sorting ‘em and take my fill of rest.
What? Was that it? Those guests were a lot weaker than I thought!
That was a trifling fight. Makin’ our job easier’s always welcome, though.
If I gather more information, will I get stronger too? Guess I’ll have to keep trying…
We still have work to do, remember? Giddy up now!
Man… I have tons of stuff to clean up! This is too tiring… Gosh~
Gotta take care of my responsibilities to the end, no?
Let’s get cleanup over with and have a nice break!
We should…sort the books first, but… Aren’t you guys curious about what these books say…?
I wonder what all’s written in a person’s book… Will it even have their favorite food in there…?
Huh, that’s all the challenge they had to offer?
I’m not sure if there’s any important info in these books…
It’s all thanks to our great efforts that we could get this good result.
I’m not very happy about killing others, but… it’s what I have to do.
I suppose it’ll be easier on my mind to think of this as a small but worthwhile step toward filling out the bookcases?
It’s always delightful to savor the joy of victory.
I’ll try harder next time so we can all win once more!
Phew… That was too close… My heart almost stopped!
Now now! Attention, everyone!! Are you all alright?! Anyone suffering from injuries?
Hnngh… Hah… Today’s battle was pretty easy…
Why don’t we sit around and read some books together when we get back, friends?
It’s a hassle to clean up the mess. …Maybe no one’d notice if I sneak off…?
It was frankly embarrassing to have such inept people as you for our guests.
A part of me is wishing for a stronger opponent to come and give us a challenge as equals next time.
I get that this is part of our work, but… I can’t help but feel a teensy bit bad about it, you know?
You should’ve retreated earlier or done something about it. Not that we would’ve let you get away.
You should have been smarter with your moves.
Every action of theirs was a display of immaturity.
I guess I just have to keep it up like now~
Yeah, let’s keep pushing on like this in the future~!
I’ll have to learn more about combat so that I can better prepare myself…!
Thank goodness, I lived through this…
I don’t feel any guilt from this. All I did is receive the guests with all my heart.
I’m glad that we managed to win this fight.
I’m sorry… It was what I had to do. Please forgive me…
The battle is over, so let’s check how many of us are still present.
Aw, I thought they were strong; I’m a little let down.
That was one heck of a battle!
And a thank you to our enemies who fought us in this battle.
Thanks, everyone. I’m not sure I helped at all, though…
I’d be glad to know that I was even just a bit helpful.
Don’t get too hung up about the results, what matters the most is that you tried, isn’t it?
Welp, if any of us made any mistakes, we can fix them later! Good work, y’all~
Sigh… I don’t want to make any more unnecessary movements for now. I squeezed out all my energy…
See! You can just leave it to me. I can handle anyone for ya.
Huhu, wouldn’t you say that I’m quite reliable?
It’s over, right…? I’m heading back inside now…
Gosh, my shoulders are aching! Can anyone give me a good massage?
I feel totally drained now that the tension’s settled down…
I don’t wanna die… I don’t wanna die in a place like this!!!
Please, save my life…
Right, gods were assholes that would always ignore desperate prayers…
Yeah, I was never good at anything, after all…
I tried my hardest, I really did! I was terrified of dying, so I tried…
At least I didn’t impede others, so I’m glad.
I hope everyone can get over my death and fight to the end.
…Gah, this sucks. All kinds of nostalgic memories are flashing before my eyes.
This is how I really die, huh… I don’t wanna move.
I shouldn’t have stepped forward and bragged that I could deal with them… Why did I bother acting heroic when I’m so petty…
I wish I was born as a more coolheaded person.
Those people came here out of their own free will… What about us? I didn’t sign up to die like this!
I’m blacking out… My body won’t move. Sorry, friends.
No… No! This can’t be!!! Help me… It’s all my fault… Please spare me…!!!
I couldn’t be of any help in the end… I’m a disgrace.
Please don’t mind me. I want the rest to stay focused on the battle…
So I wasn’t quite up for this as I expected…? How shameful…
I dug my own grave like a fool.
I couldn’t do much…because I was just too weak… I’m sorry.
Not yet… I can still fight…! I won’t give up here!!! Please, give me a second chance…
We might end up losing at this rate… I want us to win even if I die here.
Don’t get too cocky just because you bested me… The others will avenge me for sure…!
I don’t…think I can help anymore. Sorry.
Haha… This feels a bit too dangerous, doesn’t it?
…What the heck. I can’t believe it.
I did my best because I didn’t wanna die… It was all for naught; I feel so empty.
It’s.. It’s all your fault…! Damn you all… If only you actually oppressed the enemies… This wouldn’t have…!
I thought death would be a whole lot more scary, but… I actually feel relieved now.
I should’ve kept my guard up till the end…
Maybe I could’ve went on a rampage or two before dying.
I’m not too upset about it. I’ve always been preparing for this.
Maybe it’s better this way. I can finally rest now, free from any more of this suffering…
…Well, I’m sure they’ll do fine without me. I’m counting on you.
Don’t worry about me, take care of yourselves.
Sigh… It had to go like this in the end.
Why… Why did it have to go this way. Why do we all have to die!!!
Sorry. This wouldn’t have happened to you had I been more courageous and fought them harder…
Don’t blame me. I was scared too… You get it, right…?
They jumped forward on their own. I—I never asked them to protect me.
They had it coming. I told them countless times not to wield their weapon so carelessly.
We don’t even leave a corpse and just turn into books when we die? No… Help us…
I’m scared, I’m afraid… My legs are frozen… I don’t wanna die like they did…
I’ll avenge you. I swear I’ll beat them all to snuff for you… So rest easy now.
Someone, please end this hell… The person next to me just turned into a book…
……A moment of silence for the fallen.
No. No. No way! Without you, we have a higher likelihood to lose!!!
We’re not on the losing side, are we? Please tell me we aren’t…
They wanted so much to survive, and now they’re gone. That leaves a bitter taste…
My, one guy got cornered, and then~ off they went. What a pity.
I’m the most important person here, so I just have to focus on keeping myself alive…
Thank goodness it wasn’t me… I’m fine as long as I’m not the victim. I don’t wanna end up like that.
You’ve done your job well. I’m sorry I wasn’t competent enough.
Whoever dies here, don’t pay them any attention… Just focus on the battle.
I’ve already become too numb to seeing people die.
I won’t forgive them… I’ll kill everyone responsible for this!
Told you not to be so foolhardy with your moves.
They simply held up their responsibilities.
It’s alright. It’s not because you were weak or anything. So please rest in peace.
I don’t want to lose you all so suddenly! Wake up… Let’s start over again, please?
That one was too much of a coward. I’d say death was a better fate for them than breaking down from even greater anxiety.
You should’ve at least used your brain to make up for your lack of strength.
I told you it was too reckless! Why, why did you have to charge in like that?!?
It breaks my heart to see my beloved friends die out like that…
Why can’t I do anything for them!!! I’m not being helpful, not like this…
I’ve decided not to care anymore. We have to get used to this.
The fact that I’m back in yet another warzone finally starts to sink in…
I’m being reminded of horrible memories.
There’s no use mourning over the death of coworkers in a situation like this.
I should stay strong for the sake of the other colleagues.
It’s just the same shit for every different day. We’ve gone through this plenty of times, no?
Those of us who are still alive should stay sharp.
Whatever happens, my well-being comes first.
It’s unfortunate, but I couldn’t do anything to stop it.
You did well… Rest in peace.
You were too reckless. …Still, it sucks to see my long-time colleague die.
That was a smooth kill. I’m feeling fine today.
We’d be the winners with the way things are going, no?
You’re my enemy, so there’s no reason for me to let you off. Good night, sweet fellow.
Haha! I knew I could make it. Any other pals brave enough to take me on?
…I didn’t mean to hit you so hard… I didn’t want this fight, either…
I took them out without hurting myself too bad… I can make it if I try, huh?
I wonder what this guy’s book says… Aren’t you curious?
No time to relish this dub. I’m moving onto the next target immediately!
Just give me three seconds. Wow! I won! Woohoo~! …That’s enough. Back to battle.
Huh, maybe this work suits me better than I thought…?
You were out of luck, dear guest. I appreciate your efforts, regardless.
Personally, I would rather have accepted my fate and died a dignified death than throw an immature fit as a last resort.
The dead can’t speak, but the living can and should~ I won, baby!!!
That wasn’t all that difficult…? I think I could be more active about this!
Nailed it, didn’t I? I can do it if I try.
N-now I see, so this is how I do it! That was doable, even for me.
Yahoo~ Did you just see how I did that? That’s a piece of cakewalk!
That was quite the tricky foe, but… I managed to handle them. We mustn’t let our guards down yet, however.
D-did I… get to be a big help to everyone with this…?
Heheh, well, that was nothing! I could kick their ass with the flick of my pinky~
You shouldn’t have come here if you were going to be so amateurish.
That one was all strength and no style. No complaints, though; these kinds of brutes are much easier for us to deal with.
What? I think that guy rattled off something moments ago… Maybe I should’ve gave them some time to leave their dying words?
You dummy! That’s what ya get for standing in my way.
I’m not supposed to rejoice over killing somebody, although… This means I’m doing my job well.
Did I do a good job? I’m looking pretty reliable now, don’t I~?
Can’t meet the same fate as those clumsy chumps. Who’s next? Bring it on!
I must conclude your story here. I shall take a moment to grieve for you, at least.
Died all too quickly, like “Quack!” …I’m not impressed one bit!
I’m heating up!
The work… I mean, the battle seems to be progressing smoothly.
No need to be sympathetic over killing someone.
Things are not the same as before… But there’s still things I can do.
You have a millennium of combat experience to catch up to, pal.
With my old buddies, there’s nothing to be afraid of!
It was your fault, don’t make excuses about it.
Getting impatient? Your attacks got predictable.
Guess I’m not as rusty as I thought!
Your mind was even more fragile than your body. Where’s the determination to sink or swim?
I’m feeling it? Seems like I’m getting back in shape~
